articles.title: Valve will finally turn off the Steam Deck’s screen while it’s downloading games - The Verge
articles.description: Valve is beta testing a low-power way to complete downloads on your Steam Deck without having to leave the handheld running with the screen on.

articles.title: iOS 26.1 Update Offers Liquid Glass Controls, Bevy of Handy New Features - PCMag
articles.description: The first major iOS 26 update brings live translation improvements, streamlined gesture controls, new visual settings, and more. Updates are also available for iPadOS and macOS.
